study.name: Monkey correlations
study.description: Synthetic monkey (Cynologus monkey, crab-eating macaque) blood data for testing per-label Spearman correlations. Jean Chang, Eric Weitz, Jon Bistline, Eno-Abasi Augustine-Akpan, Devon Bush, Emily Hanna, Vicky Horst, Tim Tickle, Leyla Tarhan. Journal of SCP Synthetic Studies. Volume 1, p10, October 2020. Assessing the benefits of per-label correlations for single cell transcriptomics analysis.
